name: The Brewer’s Buzz: On Kombucha Making
description: Are you intrigued by the world of fermentation but unsure where to start? Ever wondered about the magic behind kombucha and its fizzy, probiotic goodness? Join us for an interactive workshop where we'll demystify the art and science of kombucha brewing. Led by brewers at Mountain Bee Kombucha, this session will cover everything from an introduction to the world to kombucha to understanding the symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast (SCOBY), and essential steps in brewing.
